article_title: New Missouri House speaker hopes to restore legislature’s now-tarnished image
article_text:
Todd Richardson became speaker of the Missouri House after John Diehl resigned in May

Poplar Bluff Republican is second-generation lawmaker; his father served 12 years in House

Ethics reform will be his top priority during the upcoming legislative session

article_metadata.description: House Speaker Todd Richardson took over the most powerful job in the Missouri General Assembly after John Diehl was forced to resign over revelations he’d exchanged sexually suggestive text messages with a 19-year-old intern.
